title: Force site-wide light (white) background regardless of system theme

requirements.summary: Force the application to use a light theme so global background tokens never switch to dark based on OS/system settings.
acceptanceCriteria: When visiting any route (e.g., /, /customer-faq, /privacy-policy), the page background is light/white and not dark/black.
On devices with system dark mode enabled, the app still renders with a light/white background by default.
No UI areas that use the global background token (e.g., Layout container and header using bg-background) appear black due to dark theme being applied automatically.

file_operations.description: Update the next-themes ThemeProvider configuration to force the light theme (disable following the system theme), ensuring the 'dark' class is not applied based on OS settings.

Add/adjust global base styles to enforce a light color scheme and a white/light background fallback at the document/body level to prevent any dark rendering even if a dark class is accidentally present.
